title: Nurarihyon no Mago (Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan)
synopsis: Rikuo Nura, a part-youkai and part-human boy, grew up as the young master of the Nura Clan. Comprising youkai of all shapes and sizes, Rikuo treated the clan like family, however, he learned that he was the only one among his classmates who saw them in this light. To most, they were terrifying creatures of folklore who ate children and relished in bloodshed. Taking this to heart, he swore to live his life as a normal human.
related_anime: ['Nurarihyon no Mago: Gekitou Dai Futsal Taikai! Nuragumi W Cup!!', 'Nurarihyon no Mago', 'Nurarihyon no Mago Recaps', 'Nurarihyon no Mago: Sennen Makyou']
